website_summaries.verdict: Easy entry makes these the ultimate laid back Chucks. With or without laces, they look good.
pros: Well-cushioned foot bed offers good padding for all-day wear
cons: Sizing can be difficult, as they run a bit long

customer_reviews.title: Chucks as expected, color was not
customer_reviews.text: The color is very misleading for the actual shoe color. I purchased black and it is definitely a faded black that almost looks blue or purple. I added a photo of my black laced chuck taylor's next to what they call "Black laceless chucks" so you can see the difference
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! ( If you choose wisely....)
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits 1/2 size too large. Put a pair of Dr. Scholl's insoles in the shoes along with the orthotics that I wear.... Now the shoes fit perfectly and are extremely comfortable. If you don't plan on any modifications to the shoes, order 1/2 size smaller than you normally would. I have 6 pairs of Converse and these are the only pair that fit a little large....
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My previous go to shoe was the Converse John Varvatos slip ons. I wore them out and needed a new pair. These are a close second. Beware this is a FADED black almost a navy blue. It's fine with me but may matter to some. They do run a little big (long) but the fit is still narrow. Overall, I like these and think they're worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted these for years, and finally broke down and purchased them on Amazon. I'm so glad I got the slip-on version, as they are are so convenient to throw on when you're leaving the house, yet they look so great (as if you actually tried to put yourself together a bit....ha!) I find that I wear them over "regular" sneakers, and they're a great alternative to flip flops when you want a casual shoe but need more coverage than a sandal. I wish I'd bought them years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the original laceless Converses purchased 10 years ago
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like the original laceless Converses purchased 10 years ago. Still wearable, fortunately. They have a more rounded toe space, which accommodates my terrible bunions. Oh well, nothing is like the good ole days!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Myers

customer_reviews.title: Love the way these are made and love the way ...
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and allot of them said shoes were large.......... so I got an 8 instead of an 8 1/2. Shoes were really a snug fit!! Wish I would of gotten larger size so he could wear them longer....... I paid $75 bucks for these!!! Too much for him to be able wear them for only a few months!! Love the way these are made and love the way they look! I will be buying more of these for my boys! Next time I will not pay attention to the reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Size is wonky
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair in gray that I live in. They are supposed to be the same size. However, the elastic has almost no give making it extremely hard to get my foot in the shoe and therefore, too tight. I also have a black pair that are too big. Converse really needs to do some QA with their products.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ruffner

customer_reviews.title: My all time favorite Converse style because I'm lazy and don't like having ...
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite Converse style because I'm lazy and don't like having to bend over to tie my shoes. I do but I prefer slip-ons. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria E.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I went with my regular size in these - I wear a 10 and have a wider foot. I love these, they do slip a teeny bit on my heel without socks but I would rather that than a size too small. I haven't tried them on with socks yet. They're so cute and I know I can wear them with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes! They seem to run a bit big, as the first pair had to be returned for a smaller size. I wear a 9.5-10 & originally ordered the unisex size 8, which translates to a womens’ size 10. They were MUCH too big. I reordered a unisex size 7 & they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: teachurobin

customer_reviews.title: Old School Critique
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these on Saturday and Mr Mail man delivered today Monday at 1:00! Fantastic Amazon no driving no crowds no stress. These are very comfortable fit great. Be aware of comments from others- they do run a bit large. I normally wear 10 ordered 9.5 perfect. At first i was concerned about slip ons? But, no worry Converse figured it out. Plan to order another pair in different color.
customer_reviews.author: Bob J.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable -- the cushioned foot bed is thick and ...
customer_reviews.text: Classic! Super comfortable -- the cushioned foot bed is thick and offers incredible support for my feet. I love these shoes. My previous pair has served me 7 + years and is now retired to garden work. Still looks pretty good though. These shoes tend to look even better with some wear to them. Very high quality construction. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda

customer_reviews.title: Even then they were my favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is because they didn't have them in my size and after checking back often to find the correct size I finally found a size a half size larger than what I normally wear. I'll live with it. I had these same shoes before and lived in them! I wore them for so long and so often that I wore them for the last 6 month or so of their life with holes in the bottoms. Even then they were my favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes - I ordered 1/2 size smaller than what I normally wear
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I was having surgery and would not be able to tie shoes for a month or so. They are serving that purpose very well. However I really like these shoes and will continue to wear them even after my recovery. I will likely order some more for variety. I did order 1/2 size smaller than I usually wear as other people have recommended - they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: The well known quality from Converse
customer_reviews.text: I like this type of sneakers, had one from Fila and now I wanted a pair from Converse. The color is not black, is more of a dark grey/blue. But I like it, I think better than if would be black. Being new the pair is a little bit tight, but this is normal. Overall I made a good choice also taking into consideration the price I paid (49$). Normally a real review would be more useful by writing it after worn it for some time (at least 1-2 months).
customer_reviews.author: Razvan

customer_reviews.title: shoe lover
customer_reviews.text: i have bought many converse over the past few years and most of them in this design.. they are definitely not for the people with wide feet, even if you get a bigger size they tend to look like boats.. but my family loves these shoes, i've even bought them for others as gifts.. if you plan on wearing then frequently though they do tend to fray quite a bit, and some of them have split from the canvas.. but still overall i will be buying more of these in the future, hopefully i can find them in other colors though..
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: It Helps to Read the Reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Of course, one of the reasons to read reviews is to figure how an item looks; nonetheless, an even better reason is to find out how an item fits. Therefore, it comes as no surprise that the majority of the writers of these reviews, were ticked off because the shoes, even the guys', were the wrong size. Thus, I ordered two - sizes that would have been too large & VOILA! THEY FIT PERFECTLY! My son normally wears an eight in a shoe; however, in a Chuck Taylor All - Star, his foot fits a ten...I kid you not! ileta A. Sumner, esq.
customer_reviews.author: ileta A. Sumner, esq.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my niece
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 13 year old niece...she asked for nice casual kicks and she already has a bunch of TOMS shoes, so I figured these would fit the bill. Easy on, easy off, pretty classy. The color is great because it goes with everything. The fit was perfect and she said they are super comfy. She was happy so I am happy....what more can you say when you're shopping for a 13 year old?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome fit - comfortable as all get out - hands down beats all those super shoes with any support
customer_reviews.author: Bill IV

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but wish I had ordered another 1/2 size smaler
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe and just as the other reviewers posted it does run a size large. I usually wear a 9 in womens but this shoe is unisex so although I ordered a size 7 in mens I should have gotten at least a 1/2 size smaller since its a bit roomier than I needed but it works and is super comfy as always. Will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the BEST EVER Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the BEST EVER Shoes !!!!! I own 5 pair of these .Love the no Lace and the Shoe Quality !!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B.

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe, they do size differently
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, love the look. Make sure to order smaller than your normal size as others have stated. I only went one size down than my normal size and it wasn't enough. The shoes I ordered are a little big but not bad enough to deal with the hassle of returning them. Other than that, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Seems l like I have 2 different shoes
customer_reviews.text: Seems l like I have 2 different shoes... one fits much larger than the other. Looking at the inside some looks different as well. Will not repurchase from this company...
customer_reviews.author: j11

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a Gift
customer_reviews.text: These are purchased as a gift so I cannot say for sure how they fit, but they are to replace an existing (worn out from too much love and wear) pair of the same size and model, so I am pretty sure they will be loved.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pardini

customer_reviews.title: Fit is very wide.
customer_reviews.text: I returned these sneakers as they were too wide and I knew one size down would not correct the wide width
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth marsden

customer_reviews.title: Fit differently than previous Converse All Star purchases
customer_reviews.text: Usually when I purchase these type of shoes from All-Star the tag shows made in China. When I received this pair it reflected this time that it was made in Vietnam. As a result they fit differently.
customer_reviews.author: Shane C

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Converse shoes. Loved them, came in PERFECT conditions. Recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: They are genuine Converse. Loved them, came very fast and in NEW conditions. I'm a Converse lover and will continue loving them. Definitely recommend them. Just one recommendation if you are a size 8 for example, go down half a size.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto Gross Veras

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe - perfect casual sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: It's going to take some breaking in. The tongue is a bit tight at first. The show is amazing, I love the slip on style and the color and texture is true to the pictures. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: I have a pair of navy exactly like this that was purchased in a converse outlet
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of navy exactly like this that was purchased in a converse outlet. The navy in the same exact size fit perfectly but these are too big. I would've ordered a unisex equivalent of a women's 6.5 had I known they would fit like they do. The quality and color of the shoe are good but the size is off. Big deterrent for me in future onkine purchases of converse shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey L Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not As Good As They Used To Be
customer_reviews.text: This used to be a great shoe until they shrunk the width of the instep an entire 1/2 inch making them very tight across the instep. My last pair were 1/2" wider across the instep and were very comfortable. These were so tight I had to send them back. Unless you have a narrow foot (I am a standard D width) don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Chucks, but better
customer_reviews.text: I love Chucks, and laceless Chucks are Chucks 2.0. Same great shoe, but even better.
customer_reviews.author: misscelestia

customer_reviews.title: Same shoe.. same size I always wear but ...
customer_reviews.text: Same shoe..same size I always wear but they are a bit small and tight..sort of disappointed
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Order 1/2 less of your shoe size
customer_reviews.text: I have in the past worn All Star Slip Ons for casual use, not to be use for long period walks since it is flat. Shoe comfort is okay, do not expect to be cushioned. On another note, if interested, consider ordering 1/2 less of shoe size. Ex: If you are size 10 (Male), order 9 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Gsus

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: I was warned to order a size smaller than normal and this was good advice as far as the length of the shoe. I wear a women's size 6 and ordered a 5. However, the shoe is too narrow. I returned them and bought a men's size 4 and they worked out nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, run a touch large though. The tounge is very thin fabric, can be a bit awkward with a slip on shoe where it easy gets folded up / shoved in / pushed aside while slipping your foot in.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: I wear a 9. 5 normal and always order ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9.5 normal and always order these in size 9 to wear with socks and size 8.5 to wear without sock.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D Haley

customer_reviews.title: Size and Color info...
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 6.5 womens and ordered a 4.5, they were too big. I got a 4 and they fit. Color is more of a washed out black. Could pass for a navy color. Not jet black. Love the no laces style and shoes are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: A Converse Classic updated as Slip-on, laces optional
customer_reviews.text: Laceless and awesome, measure to your actual shoe size, as they run long. Have an older pair in Blue so I knew how to order the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I've owned 3 pair and will continue to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Webb

customer_reviews.title: Love the laceless CTs but they are too large
customer_reviews.text: Love the laceless CTs but they are too large, so the kid inherited them brand new. Wish they had fit, but CTs really don't fit me because I'm in between sizes. As always they are well constructed and I wish they had fit!
customer_reviews.author: keileidh

customer_reviews.title: Great slip on’s!
customer_reviews.text: Good ole Chucks! Love the slip on style while still keeping the converse cool and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Niferr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and great look
customer_reviews.text: So I put down fits as expected because I've got a few other pairs of converse and they all fit the same. I wear a 9.5 in Nike and Adidas but know Converse I wear a 8.5. Perfect fit and great look.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Wrong size want to be 81/2 returning to both pairs
customer_reviews.author: Philip rapoport

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with these
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these. I wear a 6 1/2 and ordered a 4, fits great. They are a little hard to put over the heel but I'm sure once they stretch a little it will be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Like that shoes Put them on me all the time! Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible fit- way too tight across the top of foot
customer_reviews.text: Horrible fit- way too tight across the top of foot. Don't expect to just slip this shoe on, it'll take a real workout. I wear a size 7 medium and the top of my foot is not wide, nor do I have a high arch. But this shoe hurt so bad I couldn't wait to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Robert t.

customer_reviews.title: These are my go-to for just going out - they look great with skinny or straight jeans
customer_reviews.text: I constantly get compliments on these shoes. These are my go-to for just going out - they look great with skinny or straight jeans, and I love that I can just slip them on and not have to worry about the laces. I will probably never buy non-slip on Chucks again.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: And getting Amazon to swap them out is like pulling teeth
customer_reviews.text: Beware. These run at least a size too big. And getting Amazon to swap them out is like pulling teeth. Do yourself a favor and buy shoes I'm the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these Converse!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two pair of these last fall and wore them all winter. They are very comfy and when they get dirty, I just throw them in the wash! I purchased my first two pair at a Converse store which was the best for me because I needed a 1/2 size smaller. Now that I know the correct size, I can just order them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flat shoes that give good comfort. Cost to much for what is suppose ...
customer_reviews.text: Flat shoes that give good comfort. Cost to much for what is suppose to be super cheap canvas shoe. Sidewall always comes unglued and cracks just before the ball of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hawk

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend loves these.
customer_reviews.text: They're stylish and look great on him. He had been eyeing them for a while...I got him a full size smaller, and they fit! (Normally he wears 12) He is a big fan.
customer_reviews.author: ani

customer_reviews.title: Colorblind???
customer_reviews.text: Bought my son a pair in black and I receive navy blue so he kept them. A week later I ordered another pair for him in Black. I received navy blue AGAIN!! Luckily we both wear the same size shoe so I'll be keeping them for myself. Only problem is that I still need them in BLACK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay23one

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe but no arch, beefy flat. You'll have to buy a Dr Scholls insert.
customer_reviews.author: TommyMcG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome slip on converse
customer_reviews.text: I love these and wear them all the time. This is the first pair of shoes I've bought on amazon that actually for perfectly. I bought a size larger than my normal size. They look great and are very comfortable and easy to wear. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: TLOKI

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great but they are not black. They are navy blue so I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Ash4279

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love converse but I got a blue pair despite ordering black
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Valentin

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 1/2 size smaller bc they tend to run a bit large. They fit perfect. Arrived timely. They are exactly what I was looking for and are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great look, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My favorite go to sneaker at a great price. I get a lot of compliments on these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hemenway

customer_reviews.title: Sweet shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, cool and comfortable. Not much to offer in cushionyness but I put some gel liners in these and feels great. Several threads have come loose and needed to trim them away.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis G.

customer_reviews.title: For all the wide footed people out there
customer_reviews.text: this show does not come in a wide. It's difficult to get my foot in and when it's in...it's tight against the top of my foot and the side walls. Length is great just wished they came in a wide.
customer_reviews.author: casahome2000

customer_reviews.title: I recommend Chucks with my heart and sole
customer_reviews.text: Chucks are classics so what can I say about them? These have a classic look and go with anything. They are comfortable. Of course slip-ons are extra convenient. What are you waiting for? Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Try before you buy.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit waaaaaaayyyyyyyy to big. I bought a 9.5 and they said 9.5 but they fit like an 11. From what I can tell, they looked well made. Can't go wrong with Chuck's I guess...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon King

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, and I have others in this size, but these were way tight, width-wise. Same length as my other ones.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: The shoes do make my feet look like boats. Like super long feet
customer_reviews.text: I add my own arch supports so I can't really judge. The shoes do make my feet look like boats. Like super long feet. I don't know if that is an optical illusion or what. My other shoes don't make me feel that way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved the shoes today. Came on time, fine just fine, I did order half a size down due to the other reviews saying they were a little big. There is only one down side. The color is a little off. I ordered the black ones and the pictures looks like a blackish grey almost. These look black with a blue tint. But other then that I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas St. John

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are a good pair of shoes for limited wear time. I say this because if I wear these shoes for too long they start to make squeeking sounds as I walk. They are not the most comfortable shoes at all but they do slip on very fast which is the main reason I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Casey

customer_reviews.title: Bough them to match an existing pair, and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bough them to match an existing pair, and the size was completely off. Be aware, the manufacturer might have changed the molds.
customer_reviews.author: V Perez-Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Had for 2 months and shoe is falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at the end of July and the sole on the right side shoe is falling off. Shoe is essentially useless. Had many pairs of converse and have never had this happen.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Greer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good; returned for other reasons
customer_reviews.text: Heavy rubber sole, size 12 fit more like a 13, and no shoelaces made me feel as if I would walk out of these shoes with each step. Returned the item and found a lace up style at a local store
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J Wiese

customer_reviews.title: They do run big.
customer_reviews.text: Loved them, but definitely too big. Returned and bought 1/2 smaller.
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN M. LAMBERT

customer_reviews.title: Size is one size up from your normal size.
customer_reviews.text: Converse chuck taylors always run one size large. I wear size us 12 in every brand, but with chucks i wear an 11. Great product otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Ry

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: They look fabulous. Just got to break them in I guess
customer_reviews.author: sagray09

customer_reviews.title: First low cut Chucks, first slip on Chucks.
customer_reviews.text: I've had dozens of pairs of Chucks, but these are the first slip on pair I've bought They're great for travelling on airplanes with the ridiculous show removal policy. Easy on, easy off.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pain

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely narrow feet and I could not get my foot into the opening
customer_reviews.author: CJ858

customer_reviews.title: Still too big!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 7.5 women's shoe and based on the reviews I ordered half a size smaller (7). They are still a. Little too big so I would recommend a full size smaller. Otherwise they are super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Deederdun

customer_reviews.title: I didn't realize I would love the slip on sneakers and mush as I do
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize I would love the slip on sneakers and mush as I do. These are easily my favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, but I had to return them because they were too big
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes, but I had to send them back because they fell off my feet. If this were a physical store, I could have kept trying on different sizes until I found the right one, but I don't want to keep ordering and returning.
customer_reviews.author: BookaholicTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, love the design I normally wear women's 7.5 and ordered men's 5.5 and they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Riss4147

customer_reviews.title: Go to shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great slip on shoe for summer months. Fairly true with fit but I order 1/2 size larger for additional comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WAY too large- larger than other converse
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoes but 2 sizes larger than all my other converse. I have 6 pairs, all the same size except this pair.
customer_reviews.author: NoleLovers

customer_reviews.title: Same as they ever was.
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing this style for years. Only thing you have to watch is where they were made. The ones from Vietnam are cut a bit smaller than the ones produced in China. But I love em.
customer_reviews.author: SLEEPY HEAD

customer_reviews.title: Well, That Has Changed...
customer_reviews.text: It used to be, and is even still a written recommendation on these, that they run big. I have a pair of 7.5 now that were just a tiny bit tight at first but easily broke in. The 7.5s that I recently received were so small I couldn't even get my foot in to begin with, so MUCH smaller than before. I am going to try 8.5 or even 9, my usual size in most kicks. Weird.
customer_reviews.author: JackAquarius

customer_reviews.title: Chucks rule
customer_reviews.text: Nothing quite matches the Chuck Taylor All Stars from Converse. Not having to tie them makes these just so quick and easy that the dog gets walked and trash gets dumped with style and comfort. This item was not in stock at Converse.
customer_reviews.author: LO77203

customer_reviews.title: Loved the shoes, a little too big
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid more attention to what the other reviews said. The shoes, which I ordered in my regular Converse size, were a little too big. I did keep them, however, because I'm too lazy to send them back and because I really really liked them. If you're considering on ordering these shoes, then order a size smaller than usual.
customer_reviews.author: maria fe lopez

customer_reviews.title: Shoes for my son...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these shoes for my son. I like the brand and was sold on the "slip on" concept. Converse shoes normally run up to a full size bigger - so I expected that. I don't mind it as with a growing boy, he can use them a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Marivel M.

customer_reviews.title: I do Love these shoes but they do run a little large
customer_reviews.text: I do Love these shoes but they do run a little large. So I just ordered a half a size smaller and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My second pair though I wanted the charcoal / grey ones but can't seem to find that color anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Being that they are lace less 1/2 size smaller Does the trick
customer_reviews.author: arthur kennedy

customer_reviews.title: no good
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my daughter in law for CHristmas and didn't get them returned in time and now I am stuck with this shoes thaqt are too big for the women in the family and too small for the men
customer_reviews.author: Alice Mesnickow

customer_reviews.title: It feel cheap, wondering if its a reall converse ...
customer_reviews.text: It feel cheap, wondering if its a reall converse. All my all converse are 10. But this one is too large
customer_reviews.author: A. ALHAKEEM

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I hate laces (tying them, untying them, etc...) so these slip ons are perfect for me. I love the look of Chucks. One thing to note is that they do run small. I normally wear a 10 but I got an 8.5 in these and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Gave it a 5-star rating because I love slip-on vintage chucks
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a 5-star rating because I love slip-on vintage chucks. Product much closer to a 4. It's as close to the real deal as it gets
customer_reviews.author: Daebe

customer_reviews.title: Chuck T''s
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and easy to slip on and off.The name is a well know brand and the colors offered are terrific.Great for goin to the Beach
customer_reviews.author: dubdutch

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: For one--- I ordered black and they are navy blue... and two they are all frayed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite slip on shoes. They are authentic all-star Converse. In the past I've purchased elsewhere and received fakes. I will only order my Converse from this company through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Shane C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them and wear as often as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Becky F

customer_reviews.title: ... my actual size but on the site itself it recommended me to order a half size smaller
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to order my actual size but on the site itself it recommended me to order a half size smaller. As a result, it was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: color is odd
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if they sent me a pair of navy or if their black is more of a dark gray.....they are not the normal converse black color. Still kept them and till wear them cause i love the laceless ease.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Trask

customer_reviews.title: Love em, but it wasn't BLACK black...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought about 7 pairs of these (in various colors) over the years. I love slip-on chucks! I was a bit disappointed that these weren't BLACK black...but rather a dark blue/black...or a dark grey maybe...? I'm not sure exactly, but they aren't the same color black as my previous "black" pair. I'm not going to rate it any less because of that though...just giving others a heads up in case they were expecting a dark black. The product photo of the black color online is actually a pretty good representation of the true color. It's just more noticeably "light black" when I put them next to my other "black" pair of chucks.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received equivalent of men's 8 's woman's. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Jenn P
